headline: Nike downgraded by S&P as profitability slides, tariff pressures mount
summary: Investing.com -- S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Nike Inc (NYSE:NKE) to ’A+’ from ’AA-’ on concerns over declining margins, ongoing tariff exposure, and a prolonged turnaround effort. The downgrade comes amid strategic shifts following the abrupt departure of former CEO John Donahoe in 2024 and a renewed focus under current CEO Elliott Hill.

raw.headline: Nike downgraded by S&P as profitability slides, tariff pressures mount
raw.summary: Investing.com -- S&P Global Ratings has downgraded Nike Inc (NYSE:NKE) to ’A+’ from ’AA-’ on concerns over declining margins, ongoing tariff exposure, and a prolonged turnaround effort. The downgrade comes amid strategic shifts following the abrupt departure of former CEO John Donahoe in 2024 and a renewed focus under current CEO Elliott Hill.
